CoL looks a bit farther back than it needs to be, fuel looks like it may become an issue. Also, you need some OX-STAT solar panels on that sucker if you want to retain control in orbit (or RCS, but the panels are easier). I take it you have no interest in docking.

EDIT: can I see a side image? I'm concerned about your vertical CoM, CoT lineup with your intakes the way the are. You also shouldn't need more than the ram intakes. scoop intakes at high altitudes are crap.
